Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor's crucial walk in the ninth inning led to the Mets' victory over the Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor's professional at-bat and walk were pivotal in the Mets' playoff push
Brandon Nimmo highlighted Lindor's importance to the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' victory marked their first playoff series win since 2015
Francisco Lindor's leadership and defensive plays were notable
Others: The game was the first of the Division Series for the Mets
